messages.subject: Re: OT--allergy testing for eczema
messages.msgSnippet: ... (I know this wasn t addressed to me, but if you have an idea I d love to hear it.) OK.  I only itch when I walk really fast.  I can walk moderately for an
messages.messageBody:
> 4. Do you itch after a certain activity like eating, bathing, touching,
> exercising, etc?
>
(I know this wasn't addressed to me, but if you have an idea I'd love to hear
it.)
OK. I only itch when I walk really fast. I can walk moderately for an hour
and I'm fine. I can walk really fast for five minutes and I want to tear my
thighs off. I'm really scrawny, so it's not a friction thing from rubbed
together thighs. Benadryl makes it better. Any ideas what's going on?
Mary J


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
